Ruby.en: A kick with a high critical-hit ratio. May cause a burn.

Sapphire.en: A kick with a high critical-hit ratio. May cause a burn.

Emerald.en: A kick with a high critical-hit ratio. May cause a burn.

FireRed.en: A fiery kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also burn the foe.
FireRed.de: Starker Tritt mit hoher Volltrefferquote. Verursacht evtl. Verbrennung.

LeafGreen.en: A fiery kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also burn the foe.
LeafGreen.de: Starker Tritt mit hoher Volltrefferquote. Verursacht evtl. Verbrennung.

Diamond.en: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.
Diamond.de: Starker Tritt mit hoher Volltrefferquote. Verursacht eventuell Verbrennung.
